sentences.sContent: Treatment should be discontinued for serious infection or sepsis.
sentences.sContent_eng: Treatment should be discontinued for serious infection or sepsis.
sentences.sCn: 出现严重感染或脓毒症应该中断治疗。

sentences.sContent: S. aureus can cause a range of illnesses from minor skin infections to life-threatening diseases, such as pneumonia, endocarditis and sepsis.
sentences.sContent_eng: S. aureus can cause a range of illnesses from minor skin infections to life-threatening diseases, such as pneumonia, endocarditis and sepsis.
sentences.sCn: 金黄色葡萄球菌能引起从轻微皮肤感染到危及生命的一系列疾病，如肺炎、心内膜炎和败血症。

sentences.sContent: Using several animal and human models of the disease, the authors performed a series of experiments to confirm the association between sepsis and circulating levels of VEGF.
sentences.sContent_eng: Using several animal and human models of the disease, the authors performed a series of experiments to confirm the association between sepsis and circulating levels of VEGF.
sentences.sCn: 研究人员使用一些动物和人类脓毒症模型，通过一系列的试验来确认脓毒症与VEGF水平之间存在关联。

synos.tran: 败血症，[外科][医]脓毒病；腐败作用

words.tran: 败血症的；[医] 脓毒性的；腐败的

trans.tranOther: an infection in part of the body, in which  pus  is produced
